law.catch_line: Any deposits taken in connection with the sale by a developer of units in a condominium intended for...
law.text: Any deposits taken in connection with the sale by a developer of units in a condominium intended for residential use shall be deposited or held in an escrow account as provided in § 10-301 of this article, unless a corporate surety bond is obtained and maintained as provided in § 10-301 of this article.
